default-ip.description: IP, on which app will be listening (0.0.0.0 means any IP)

default-port.description: Port, on which app will be listening

minify-scripts.description: Decide if static scripts will be minified

datasource-primary-host.description: Primary datasource config is used as default datasource config, usually it is mongodb on localhost

datasource-primary-port.description: Primary datasource config is used as default datasource config, usually it is mongodb on port 27017

datasource-primary-username.description: Database user name (leave blank if there is no db auth)

datasource-primary-database.description: Leave blank to use application name as database name

auth-key-name.description: Auth key, used instead of auth cookie in query or header, default is 'apiKey'

session-cookie-secure.description: If checked, session cookie will be send to server only if HTTPS (we strongly recommend to leave it checked)

session-cookie-httpOnly.description: If checked, session cookie will not be accessible by javascript (we strongly recommend to leave it checked)

session-cookie-expires.description: Session cookie expiration in hours, after this period, user will be signed out

auth-default-roles.description: Default role of every registered user signed in, do not use roles such as 'admin'

auth-default-allowedIP.description: Default api allowed IP of every registered user signed in (use '*' to allow any)

auth-datasource.description: Auth data source - do not use JsonFileDataSource in production

auth-datasource-filePath.description: If using JsonFileDataSource, this will be required

auth-datasource-username.description: If using MongoDataSource, leave blank to use primary datasource database

auth-datasource-password.description: If using MongoDataSource, leave blank to use primary datasource database

auth-datasource-database.description: If using MongoDataSource, leave blank to use primary datasource database

auth-datasource-caching.description: Turn off when scaling app horizontally

auth-mailer-use.description: Which mailer use when sending forgot pass emails

mailer-primary-from.description: Email from which will be messages come from

mailer-primary-tls.description: Smtp server secure sending TLS on/off

mailer-primary-user.description: Username registered in smtp server (when smtp auth enabled)

mailer-primary-password.description: Password for user registered in smtp server (when smtp auth enabled)
